title.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND HORSE RIDING TOUR

tagline.title: BALI WATER SPORTS AND HORSE RIDING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MARINE ADVENTURE AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO HORSEBACK RIDING TOURS
tagline.text: BALI WATER SPORTS AND HORSE RIDING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MARINE ADVENTURE AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO HORSEBACK RIDING TOURS
tagline.html: BALI WATER SPORTS AND HORSE RIDING TOUR PACKAGES IS COMBO ACTIVITIES TO ENJOY MARINE ADVENTURE AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO HORSEBACK RIDING TOURS

description.text: Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages Is combo activity pacakges to enjoy the amazing Water Sports activity from many kind selection we offer and then do the horseback riding tour packages in Bali Islands. You will enjoy this combo pacakges we created by doing water activity and riding amazing horse during your holiday. First activity you will do is the great Water Sport Adventure packages we offer such as : Banana Boat, Flying Fish, Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands Tour. You will guide with our professional Bali Water Sports guide and will make every second is full of joyment. After finish the water sports activity and you will lead to the restaurant for enjoy the lunch Indonesian food we offer. After finish lunch our Bali Tour Driver will escort you the Horse Riding stable for enjoy 1 Hours 30 Minutes riding a horse through the beautiful beach of Serangan Beach and passing the local village and see the unique daily social activity life. After finish the horse riding, our English speaking driver will escort you back to your hotel by bring the amazing memory. This Bali Water Sport and Horse Riding Tour will make your holiday more memorable one and surely will make your day more impressive.

title.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. This adventure will give you an rare experience by allowed you to explore the hidden beauty of this islands by riding horse with our professional horseback riding guide. You will see the beauty of the beach from the top of a horse and passed the local village to see the social activities life. The sounds of horses hooves echoing through the crashing waves of the beach and take a unique look at Balinese life as you pass the local village. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life.
description.html: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. button.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Packages

price.title: Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,875,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,350,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,175,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,100,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,050,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking
  • For horse riding maximum weight is 90kg

Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Price Included :

  • Return Transfer with Comfortable Private Car
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Bali Water Sports Tour Packages :
    1. Flying Fish (2 Fly)
    2. Banana Boat (15 Minutes)
    3. Glass Bottom Boat and Turtle Islands (60 Minutes)
  • 1 Hours 30 Minutes Horse Riding Tour
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Professional Water Sports and Horse Riding Guide
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Water Sports and Horse Riding Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Pick up at the hotel (time depend of the location hotel you stay)
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Enjoy 1 Hours 30 Minutes Horse Riding Tour
Horse Riding finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
